Title: The Gift of Relief
Description:
You adventurers are known to carry heavy burdens. There will be no better time to confront them than now. 

I saw a veteran somewhere around here. There is a chance he may know what it means to cope with stress. 

Perhaps he has insight to teach you.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Simeon Griswold at the Gala of Gifts, then relieve your stress in Old Town.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Simeon Griswold at the Gala of Gifts.
